description: NEW TRENT: Chargepak NT600CThe Chargepak with 5V@2A/ 1A outputs is capable of charging a tablet (2A) and two Smartphones (1A) at the same time thanks to its triple output ports.Performance Highlight.Apple iPad 2: >70% battery life.iPhone 5/ Android Smartphones:> 300% battery life.Compatible with Most Smartphones and Tablets.Apple*: iPhone 5 / 4S / 4 / 3G, iPad mini, The New iPad 4 / 3 / 2 / iPad 1st gen, iPod Touch /NanoSamsung: Galaxy Note II / Note, Galaxy S4 / S3 / S2, Galaxy Nexus and most Samsung phones.HTC: ONE, One X, One S, Droid Incredible 4G, and most HTC phones.Nokia: Lumia 920 / 900 / 710 / 800 / N8 / N9 and most Nokia phones.Motorola: Razr Maxx HD, Droid series, and most Motorola phonesBlackberry**: Z10, Touch, Torch, Tour, Storm 2, Bold and most Blackberry phonesLG: Nexus 4, Optimus 4X / 2X / V / S / T, and most LG phones.Other**: Nook COLOR, Nexus 10, Nexus 7, Galaxy Note / 10.1 / 8.0 / 7.0, Nintendo DSi / 3DS/XL, PSP / PS Vita and other compatible 5V devices* For Apple devices, use the original Lightning or 30 pin cable.**Some phone/tablets/devices may require a special converter cable to be compatible.Specifications.- Capacity 6000mAh@3.7V (22.2Wh)- Recharge time: 7-8 hrs- Dimension: 3.9x2.6x1.1 inchNew Trent is a trademark of New Trent Inc, and is exclusively marketed by iDealpoint on Amazon.com. Be sure to find the logo on both product and package to ensure a 10 months product warranty.
title: New Trent Chargepak NT600C 6000mAh External Battery Pack with Triple Port Output and Built-in AC Wall Charger
